languages.text: {n}Губернатор Урбенд окружен высокородными гостями, словно планета — спутниками. Все его обаяние направлено на человека в роскошной силовой броне, украшенной знаком {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}. Но стоит вам приблизиться, как Драйвстем склоняется в элегантном поклоне, опередив всех прочих в изъявлении лояльности.{/n} "Великий день, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор Урбенд окружен высокородными гостями, словно планета — спутниками. Все его обаяние направлено на человека в роскошной силовой броне, украшенной знаком инквизиции. Но стоит вам приблизиться, как Драйвстем склоняется в элегантном поклоне, опередив всех прочих в изъявлении лояльности.{/n} "Великий день, Ваша милость!"

languages.text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор Урбенд окружен высокородными гостями, словно планета — спутниками. Все его обаяние направлено на человека в роскошной силовой броне, украшенной знаком {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}. Но стоит вам приблизиться, как Драйвстем склоняется в элегантном поклоне, опередив всех прочих в изъявлении лояльности.{/n} "Великий день, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor Urbend is surrounded with highborn guests like a planet with moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armor adorned with the sign of the Inquisition. But as soon as you approach, Urbend is the first to give you an elegant bow, outpacing the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

But as soon as you approach, Urbend is the first to give you an elegant bow, outpacing the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

{n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: {n}アーベント・ドライブステム総督は、多数の衛星が周回する惑星さながらに、ハイボーンのゲストたちに囲まれて立っている。自身の魅力を全力でアピールする相手は{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の印章が刻まれた、まばゆく光るパワーアーマーに身を包んだ男性だ。しかし、あなたが近づくとすぐに、ドライブステムはあなたに向かって優雅なお辞儀をして忠誠を示すために皆から進み出る。{/n}「今日は良き日となりましたね、陛下！」
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アーベント・ドライブステム総督は、多数の衛星が周回する惑星さながらに、ハイボーンのゲストたちに囲まれて立っている。自身の魅力を全力でアピールする相手は{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の印章が刻まれた、まばゆく光るパワーアーマーに身を包んだ男性だ。しかし、あなたが近づくとすぐに、ドライブステムはあなたに向かって優雅なお辞儀をして忠誠を示すために皆から進み出る。{/n}「今日は良き日となりましたね、陛下！」

languages.text: {n}厄本·德莱夫斯塔总督站在贵宾们的簇拥下，仿佛一颗被众多卫星环绕的行星。他恭恭敬敬地接待着一位身着华丽动力装甲，饰有{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}标志的人，但你刚一走近，他就赶在所有人之前，优雅地向你鞠了一躬，抢先表达了自己的忠诚。{/n}“今天真是个伟大的日子，大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}厄本·德莱夫斯塔总督站在贵宾们的簇拥下，仿佛一颗被众多卫星环绕的行星。他恭恭敬敬地接待着一位身着华丽动力装甲，饰有{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}标志的人，但你刚一走近，他就赶在所有人之前，优雅地向你鞠了一躬，抢先表达了自己的忠诚。{/n}“今天真是个伟大的日子，大人！”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador Urbend Drivestem está rodeado de nobles invitados, como un planeta orbitado por sus lunas. Dirige todos sus encantos a un hombre ataviado con una resplandeciente servoarmadura adornada con el sello de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}. Pero, en cuanto te acercas, Drivestem es el primero en inclinarse ante ti, adelantándose a los demás en esta muestra de lealtad.{/n} «¡Es un gran día, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador Urbend Drivestem está rodeado de nobles invitados, como un planeta orbitado por sus lunas. Dirige todos sus encantos a un hombre ataviado con una resplandeciente servoarmadura adornada con el sello de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}. Pero, en cuanto te acercas, Drivestem es el primero en inclinarse ante ti, adelantándose a los demás en esta muestra de lealtad.{/n} «¡Es un gran día, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: {n}Tels des satellites orbitant autour d'une planète, quantité d'invités de la haute noblesse gravitent autour du gouverneur Urbend Drivestem. Toute son attention semble concentrée sur un homme engoncé dans une armure imposante ornée du symbole de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, mais dès que vous approchez, il est le premier à s'incliner pour vous exprimer sa loyauté.{/n} « Quelle formidable journée, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tels des satellites orbitant autour d'une planète, quantité d'invités de la haute noblesse gravitent autour du gouverneur Urbend Drivestem. Toute son attention semble concentrée sur un homme engoncé dans une armure imposante ornée du symbole de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, mais dès que vous approchez, il est le premier à s'incliner pour vous exprimer sa loyauté.{/n} « Quelle formidable journée, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: {n}Gouverneur Urbend Drivestem wird von hochstehenden Gästen umringt wie ein Planet von vielen Monden. Seinen ganzen Charme verwendet er akut auf einen Mann in einer prächtigen Servorüstung, die das Zeichen der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} aufweist. Aber sobald du dich näherst, verbeugt sich Drivestem als Erster vor dir, um seine Loyalität zu demonstrieren.{/n} "Heute ist ein großer Tag, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gouverneur Urbend Drivestem wird von hochstehenden Gästen umringt wie ein Planet von vielen Monden. Seinen ganzen Charme verwendet er akut auf einen Mann in einer prächtigen Energierüstung, die das Zeichen der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} aufweist. Aber sobald du dich näherst, verbeugt sich Drivestem als Erster vor dir, um seine Loyalität zu demonstrieren.{/n} "Heute ist ein großer Tag, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"

languages.text: {n}Vali Urbend Drivestem, çok uydulu bir gezegen misali etrafında dönen pek çok soylu konuğuyla odanın ortasında duruyor. Vali; {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} sembolüyle bezenmiş, göz kamaştırıcı bir güç zırhı giyen bir adamın gözüne girmek için çırpınıyor. Sen yaklaşınca ise Drivestem, diğer herkesi geçip önünde zarifçe eğilerek seni selamlıyor ve sadakatini ilk ortaya koyan oluyor.{/n} "Bugün çok büyük bir gün {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem stands surrounded by highborn guests like a planet orbited by many moons. All of his charm is directed at a man in resplendent power armour adorned with the sigil of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. But as soon as you approach, Drivestem is the first to give you an elegant bow, getting ahead of the rest in the expression of loyalty.{/n} "This is a great day, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali Urbend Drivestem, çok uydulu bir gezegen misali etrafında dönen pek çok soylu konuğuyla odanın ortasında duruyor. Vali, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} sembolüyle bezenmiş ve göz kamaştırıcı bir güç zırhı giyen bir adamın gözüne girmek için çırpınıyor. Sen yaklaşınca ise Drivetem, diğer herkesi geçip önünde zarifçe eğilerek selamlıyor, sadakatini herkesten önce ortaya koyuyor.{/n} "Bugün çok büyük bir gün {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
